code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,createStore}from"redux";import profileReducer from"./ProfileReducer";import usersReducer from"./UsersReducer";import authReducer from"./AuthReducer";import thunkMiddleware from'redux-thunk';var reducers=combineReducers({profile:profileReducer,users:usersReducer,auth:authReducer});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));window.store=store;export default store;
